sentences.en: A new supermarket will be put up in this neighborhood next year.
sentences.cn: 明年要在这个居民区建一家超级市场.

sentences.en: Each neighborhood had its own organization of snoops who reported strangers to the authorities.
sentences.cn: 每个居民区都有自己的侦探组织，他们向当局汇报陌生人的情况。

sentences.en: He is street smart and is not afraid of this neighborhood.
sentences.cn: 他有都市人的精明劲儿，不怕在这附近混。

sentences.en: He lives somewhere in the neighborhood of the station.
sentences.cn: 他住在火车站附近的某个地方.

sentences.en: Her children had the best, most elaborate birthday parties in the neighborhood.
sentences.cn: 她的孩子们的生日聚会在街坊四邻里是最好、最讲究的。

sentences.en: His ill luck has been whispered about the neighborhood.
sentences.cn: 他的不幸遭遇已在邻居中传开.

sentences.en: How do you feel about going back to the neighborhood?
sentences.cn: 对回到这个街区你有何感想？

sentences.en: Is there a good Chinese restaurant in the neighborhood?
sentences.cn: 这附近有没有好的中餐馆？

sentences.en: It is a neighborhood beset by all the usual inner-city problems.
sentences.cn: 这是个为各种内城常见问题所困扰的社区。

sentences.en: Iterates may be categorized into stable and unstable sets depending on whether a neighborhood under iteration converges or diverges. Some move toward stability, others away.
sentences.cn: 根据一个受迭代影响的社区是聚合还是发散，迭代可以被归类到稳定和不稳定集。有些转向稳定，有些转离。

sentences.en: Kids in his neighborhood clipped his picture from the newspaper and carried it around.
sentences.cn: 附近的孩子们从报纸上剪下他的照片，到哪儿都带着。

sentences.en: The bigger children in the neighborhood molested the younger ones.
sentences.cn: 邻居家的大孩子欺负小孩子.

sentences.en: The family were ostracized by the neighborhood.
sentences.cn: 邻居们都不理睬那一家人.

sentences.en: The neighborhood is given over to performers, stilt walkers and drag queens.
sentences.cn: 社区变成了玩杂耍的、踩高跷的和扮装皇后的天地。

sentences.en: The total was in the neighborhood of 100 pounds.
The whole neighborhood have been hunting for the missing child.
sentences.cn: 整条街的人都在寻找那个失踪的孩子.

sentences.en: We look towards the amalgamation of some of the neighborhood factories.
sentences.cn: 我们指望合并一些里弄工厂.

sentences.en: What happened in the factory is being whispered about the neighborhood.
sentences.cn: 工厂里发生的事正在附近居民中私下传说。

words.tran_cn: 邻近；周围；邻居关系；附近一带
与…为邻；位于附近（neighbor的ing形式）

trans.tran_cn: 地区，某地区的人，与某处邻近的地区，临近街坊
trans.tran_en: the area around you or around a particular place
